Article.ArticleTitle: Correction to: Medicinal plants used by women in Mecca: urban, Muslim and gendered knowledge.

AbstractText: In the original publication [1] were the Arabic letters in Table 2 incorrect. The corrected version of Table 2 can be found as Additional file 1 in this Erratum.
